Denver, Colorado, USA. 23rd June 2015. Demonstrators in Denver burn a U.S. flag
at a rally to protest state-sponsored racism, such as the flying of the
Confederate flag at the South Carolina State Capitol and the shooting of unarmed
black men by white police officers. © Stuart Sipkin/Alamy Live News.
